title: [Large-Scale] Enhancing Intercultural Communication Competencies in LIS E-Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic library and information science knowledge, fundamental digital literacy
context.additional_context: Small-scale corporate training program conducted in a smartphone-centric limited technology environment. Learners consist of LIS (Library and Information Science) field professionals requiring international collaboration project experience

learning_goals: Learners can successfully complete LIS field e-learning projects through collaboration with peers from diverse cultural backgrounds
Learners can identify at least three intercultural communication barriers and propose resolution strategies through e-interviews and case analysis
Learners can establish effective communication strategies based on analyzing learner-instructor personal traits (motivation, cultural similarity) in PBL environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
